rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
At the beginning of your end step, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If a creature isn't returned this way, create a 4/4 Elemental creature token that's all colors.
flavor_text: [i]Like you imagined when you were young.[/i]
notes:
When You Were Young — The Killers
